detailed_design.description: Quick wins for code cleanup: remove duplicate Telegram adapter, add .temp/ to .gitignore, remove unused code, fix indentation issues.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Delete adapters/telegram_adapter.py (keep core/adapters_telegram.py). 2. Add .temp/ to .gitignore. 3. Fix regex indentation in security.py. 4. Remove unused get_adapter() method from router.py.

user_stories.story: As a developer, I want clean code without duplication.
